altername_name: Mobile Suit Gundam: Gundam vs. Gundam NEXT PLUS
name: Kidou Senshi Gundam: Gundam vs. Gundam NEXT PLUS
overview: Mobile Suit Gundam: Gundam vs. Gundam Next Plus is the PSP port of the arcade game Gundam vs. Gundam Next, the seventh iteration of the " Gundam vs" series of games. It includes several new mobile suits, and adds the new NEXT Plus mode.
